events.message: We have received the application from Jane Doe for the Software Engineer position posted last week.
Jane Doe's application has been correctly categorized under Engineering roles based on her resume and experience.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage Jane Doe's application process for the engineering vacancy.
Completed initial phone screening with Jane Doe, discussed her past software development projects and technical skills.
Received a prompt and enthusiastic response from Jane confirming her availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Scheduled a technical interview for Jane Doe on May 7th at 10:00 AM with our lead software engineer.
Jane performed exceptionally well during the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding and problem-solving skills.
HR interview has been scheduled for Jane Doe on May 10th to discuss company culture and benefits.
Completed HR interview; Jane showed great enthusiasm for the role and alignment with the company values.
Extended a formal employment offer to Jane Doe including salary, benefits, and start date details.
Received positive feedback from Jane expressing her excitement and appreciation for the offer details.
Jane Doe has formally accepted the offer and confirmed her start date, looking forward to joining the engineering team.
Initiated onboarding process for Jane Doe including access to tools, introductions, and first week schedule.
Successfully closed hiring for the Software Engineer position with Jane Doe joining as a full-time team member.
